product_name: Patagonia  Merino 1 Silkweight Crew Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: From the hiking trail to the treadmill, the men's Patagonia Merino 1 Silkweight Crew Long Underwear Top offers versatile performance in warm weather when it's too hot for heavier base layers.
short_description: From the hiking trail to the treadmill, the men's Patagonia Merino 1 Silkweight Crew Long Underwear Top offers versatile performance in warm weather when it's too hot for heavier base layers.
